page.title: 06The Ring Road
page.content: The new ring road was opened about a year ago. It goes round the south of Buckingham and joins up the road from the west{(OXFORD)}with the one from the east{(MILTON KEYENES and BEDFORD). Before the ring road was opened the traffic had to use the town centre. This has {narrow streets}and awkward corners and was not able to take big juggernaut lorries. A{protest }group kept pushing for a ring road. They even took part in a demostration where they stood right on the edge of the pavement causing a traffic jam because lorries had to mount the kerb to get round the town hall. The survey shows that over{80%}of through traffic now{uses}the ring road and over{90%}of the heavy lorries.
